医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
如何选择更健康的无麸质面包与含麸质的纤维相比，无麸质（GF）面包和面粉通常含有较少的天然纤维和更多的脂肪，含有较高的饱和脂肪的成本，添加了木座或牙龈促进纤维。研究人员敦促更好的配方将GF饮食的营养品质与传统选择相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/how-to-to-pick-healthier-gluten-free-bread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/how-to-to-pick-healthier-gluten-free-bread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89370af4-b3CA-47EC-8622-8622-8D306225CFEF Sun, 09 Mar 2025 22:07:00 -0400 How to pick healthier gluten-free bread
GLP-1药物可能降低2型糖尿病患者的白血病和淋巴瘤的风险研究人员发现，GLP-1受体激动剂（GLP-1RAS）显着降低了2型糖尿病患者中几种血液癌的风险，尤其是与胰岛素相比。该研究还强调了GLP-1RA作为癌症保护的潜力，与葡萄糖控制无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/glp-1-drugs-may-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-of-leukemia-and-lymphoma-ind-phoma-in-type-2-diabetes-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/glp-1-drugs-may-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-of-leukemia-and-lymphoma-in-phoma-in-type-2-diabetes-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6862fe90-8e2b-43d7-86f2-42c0e3fb83fb83ef Sun, 09 Mar 2025 21:33:00 -0400 GLP-1 drugs may cut risk of leukemia and lymphoma in type 2 diabetes patients
微生物组发现最终可以成为治疗方法吗？科学家展示道路研究人员提出了一种新型的迭代策略，结合了大数据和实验模型，将微生物组研究从理论转移到临床应用。该研究强调了需要弥合相关与因果关系之间的差距，以开发有效的基于微生物组的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/can-microbiome-discoveries-finally-become-become-treatments-scientistss-scientists-show-way-way-way.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/can-microbiome-discoveries-finally-become-become-treatments-scientistists-scientists-show-way-way-way-way.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ba56efa-cfc2-490d-bbf5-bbf5-bc6c6c62cf5a5d Sun, 09 Mar 2025 21:11:00 -0400 Can microbiome discoveries finally become treatments? Scientists show the way
研究发现产前暴露可能会损害认知怀孕和儿童期间暴露于氟化物可能会对儿童的认知能力产生负面影响。即使是低于国际标准的氟化物水平也低，也与较低的知觉和言语推理分数有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/fluorides-safety-under-under-scrutiny-as-scrutiny-as-scudy-finds-prenatal-prenatal-ceplenatal-cental-may-may-impair-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/fluorides-safety-safety-under-scrutiny-ascrutiny-as-scudy-find-finds-prenatal-prenatal-cental-cental-may-impair-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e9927961-3ec1-45d6-94df-1ca3d1137f91 Sun, 09 Mar 2025 20:45:00 -0400 Fluoride's safety under scrutiny as study finds prenatal exposure may impair cognition
长期NSAID使用可能会降低痴呆症风险长期NSAID使用降低了痴呆症风险，尤其是在没有APOE-ε4基因的痴呆症风险中，强调了剂量水平上持续抗炎治疗的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/long-term-nsaid-use-may-lower-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/long-term-nsaid-use-may-may-lower-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22623C77-5703-40F9-9415-CDACB910A07F Sun, 09 Mar 2025 19:23:00 -0400 Long-term NSAID use may lower dementia risk
大零售连锁店是否驱动全球肥胖？研究证实了令人震惊的链接与肥胖症流行有关的大型食物链的全球崛起；在过去的十年中，不健康的食品销售急剧激增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/are-big-retail-chins-chins-chins-driving-global-obesity-study-confirms-alarmarming-link.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/are-big-retail-chins-chins-diver-global-obesity-study-confirms-alarmand-alarmand-link-link.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34d84981-4ab5-4203-a606-88cd6fd37336 Sun, 09 Mar 2025 18:53:00 -0400 Are big retail chains driving global obesity? Study confirms alarming link
这些简单的饮食调整可以削减体内的微塑料研究人员确定了基于饮食和生活方式的策略，这些策略可能会减少人类对微塑料和纳米塑料的接触。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/these-simple-diet-tweaks-could-slash-slash-microplastics-in-your-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/these-simple-diet-tweaks-could-slash-slash-microplastics-in-your-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4ec0738-f984-4446-aacd-6A9382344248 Sun, 09 Mar 2025 18:42:00 -0400 These simple diet tweaks could slash microplastics in your body
研究的人阐明了全球孕产妇死亡危机根据世界卫生组织（WHO）今天发布的一项新研究，出血 - 严重的严重出血 - 诸如先兆子痫之类的高血压疾病是孕产妇死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/who-study-sheds-light-on-n-global-mortnal-mortalath-mortality-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/who-study-sheds-light-on-global-mortnal-mortaly-mortality-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8bfae0e-3d04-4fe04fe0-a767-08acddea99399 Sun, 09 Mar 2025 12:58:59 -0400 WHO study sheds light on global maternal mortality crisis
了解LSD1在细胞过程和疾病中的作用一项新的综述凸显了LSD1（赖氨酸特异性去甲基酶1）在调节关键细胞过程及其对人类疾病的影响中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/understanding-the-role-f-lsd1-in-cellular-processes-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/understanding-the-role-of-lsd1-in-cellular-processes-and-processes-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68FCC307-2E99-415D-BC49-54C569518407 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:25:00 -0400 Understanding the role of LSD1 in cellular processes and disease
阐明肺癌中LUAD和LUSC之间的遗传差异肺癌仍然是癌症相关死亡率的主要原因之一，肺腺癌（LUAD）和肺鳞状细胞癌（LUSC）代表非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）最普遍的亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/unraveling-the-the-genetic-differences-between-luad-and-and-lusc-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/unraveling-the-the-genetic-differences-between-luad-and-and-lusc-in-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d456bfdf-4EE2-4B54-AB42-D5411EB6CFC6 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:13:00 -0400 Unraveling the genetic differences between LUAD and LUSC in lung cancer
